trans-unit.source: Represents assembly binding information that can be added to an instance of <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示可以加入至執行個體的組件繫結資訊<xref href="System.AppDomain"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Members of this interface are used with the <xref:System.AppDomain.GetData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.AppDomain.SetData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods to identify the <xref:System.AppDomain> data to use.
trans-unit.target: 此介面的成員會搭配<xref:System.AppDomain.GetData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.AppDomain.SetData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，以識別<xref:System.AppDomain>要使用的資料。</xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.AppDomain.SetData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.AppDomain.GetData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the directory containing the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定包含應用程式的目錄名稱。

trans-unit.source: Used when getting or setting the assembly cache manager's APPBASE variable.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定組件快取管理員 APPBASE 變數時使用。

trans-unit.source: This is the directory where the assembly manager should begin probing for assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 這是組件管理員應該開始探查組件的目錄。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be changed after the <xref:System.AppDomain> has finished its first bind.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不能變更之後<xref:System.AppDomain>已完成其第一個繫結。</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containg the name of the application base directory.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含應用程式基底目錄的名稱。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定應用程式的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that is the name of the application.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>也就是應用程式的名稱。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the name of an area specific to the application where files are shadow copied.
trans-unit.target: 取得與設定其中的檔案已陰影複製的應用程式特定區域的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that is the fully-qualified name of the directory path and file name where files are shadow copied.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>也就是完整限定名稱其中的檔案已陰影複製的目錄路徑和檔案名稱。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the name of the configuration file for an application domain.
trans-unit.target: 取得及設定應用程式定義域的組態檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The configuration file describes the search rules and configuration data for the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 組態檔會描述應用程式定義域的組態資料與搜尋規則。

trans-unit.source: The host that creates the application domain is responsible for supplying this data because the meaningful values vary from situation to situation.
trans-unit.target: 建立應用程式定義域的主機會負責提供這項資料，因為有意義的值不同的狀況。

trans-unit.source: For example, the configuration data for ASP.NET applications is stored for each application, site, and computer, while the configuration data for an executable is stored for each application, user, and computer.
trans-unit.target: 例如，ASP.NET 應用程式的組態資料會儲存為每個應用程式、 網站和電腦，而可執行檔的組態資料會儲存每個應用程式、 使用者及電腦。

trans-unit.source: Only the host knows the specifics of the configuration data for a particular circumstance.
trans-unit.target: 只有主機才會知道組態資料的詳細資訊，為特定狀況。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be changed after the <xref:System.AppDomain> has finished its first bind.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不能變更之後<xref:System.AppDomain>已完成其第一個繫結。</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the name of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>指定組態檔的名稱。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the directory where dynamically generated files are stored and accessed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定儲存及存取動態產生的檔案的目錄。

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.AppDomain> is created, a directory called the Dynamic Directory can be specified to store dynamic assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.AppDomain>已建立，稱為動態目錄可以指定目錄來儲存動態組件。</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: This directory is logically located under the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A>, although it can reside in another part of the directory.
trans-unit.target: 此目錄邏輯上位於<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A>，不過可以位於另一個組件的目錄。</xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be changed after the <xref:System.AppDomain> has finished its first bind.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不能變更之後<xref:System.AppDomain>已完成其第一個繫結。</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the directory containing dynamic assemblies.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，指定包含動態組件的目錄。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the license file associated with this domain.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與這個定義域相關聯的使用權檔案的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the name of the license file.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>指定的使用權檔案的名稱。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the list of directories that is combined with the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase*> directory to probe for private assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的目錄，並結合清單<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase*>探查私用組件的目錄。</xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase*>

trans-unit.source: Private assemblies are deployed in the same directory structure as the application.
trans-unit.target: 私用組件會部署在相同的目錄結構與應用程式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing a list of directory names, where each name is separated by a semicolon.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含清單的目錄名稱，其中的每個名稱以分號隔開。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the private binary directory path used to locate an application.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來找出應用程式的私用二進位檔的目錄路徑。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to exclude the application directory path from the search for the application.
trans-unit.target: 設定此屬性可搜尋應用程式從排除的應用程式的目錄路徑。

trans-unit.source: The search is restricted to private and global binary directory paths, and the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋僅限於私用和全域二進位檔的目錄路徑，以及在全域組件快取項目。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be changed after the <xref:System.AppDomain> has finished its first bind.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不能變更之後<xref:System.AppDomain>已完成其第一個繫結。</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing a list of directory names, where each name is separated by a semicolon.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含清單的目錄名稱，其中的每個名稱以分號隔開。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the names of the directories containing assemblies to be shadow copied.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定包含要陰影複製組件的目錄名稱。

trans-unit.source: All directories specified by <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPath%2A>, including the directory specified by <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A>, are shadow copied by default if this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的所有目錄<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPath%2A>，包括所指定的目錄<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A>，陰影複製依預設，如果沒有設定這個屬性。</xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A> </xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPath%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an executable file is in use, updates to the executable file are stored in a shadow copy directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在使用中的可執行檔，可執行檔的更新會儲存在陰影複製目錄中。

trans-unit.source: Existing users continue using the original executable file until it terminates, while new users use the shadow copied executable file.
trans-unit.target: 現有的使用者會繼續使用原始的可執行檔，直到它所終止，而新的使用者使用陰影複製可執行檔。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be changed after the <xref:System.AppDomain> has finished its first bind.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不能變更之後<xref:System.AppDomain>已完成其第一個繫結。</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing a list of directory names, where each name is separated by a semicolon.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含清單的目錄名稱，其中的每個名稱以分號隔開。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that indicates whether shadow copying is turned on or off.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指示陰影複製開啟或關閉的字串。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be changed after the <xref:System.AppDomain> has finished its first bind.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不能變更之後<xref:System.AppDomain>已完成其第一個繫結。</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the value "true" to indicate that shadow copying is turned on; or "false" to indicate that shadow copying is turned off.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>包含值"true"表示陰影複製為開啟，"false"表示陰影複製為關閉。</xref:System.String>
